### 3. Contributor Checklist
**Please check every box.**

- [ ] I have read the [**CONTRIBUTING.md**](CONTRIBUTING.md) and the [**Code of Conduct**](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
- [ ] I agree to license my contribution under the project's **LGPLv3 license**.
- [ ] My code follows the project's existing style and structure.
- [ ] I have **NOT** included any of my private "secret sauce" (e.g., my personal voicebank files, textures, or training data).
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally and they work as expected.
